title: Sport Logo Typography
author: djchris

comments.content: It must be **[Chica Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110353/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=HaroldsFonts%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Chica%20Mono%20-%20Regular&fid=ed24a98190e2d9054b30c8a28940c2f4&fsize=60&text=rueda%20sport&fit=1)** by Harold Lohner [HaroldsFonts, 2000]
